channel.title: Breakfast on Cookbook
channel.description: Recent content in Breakfast on Cookbook

item.title: Breakfast Casserole
item.description: Ingredients 1 pound ground sausage 1 onion, chopped 1 red bell pepper, chopped 12 large eggs 1/2 cup milk 1 tablespoon hot sauce 1/2 teaspoon salt 1/4 teaspoon black pepper 1 bag frozen potato tots (32 ounce) 1 cup shredded cheese Notes Build in miniature with muffin cups for about 24 egg muffins! Directions preheat over to 350 degrees heat a large skillet over medium-high heat cook sausage until browned and broken up, about 5 minutes add onion and bell pepper, stirring occasionally, 8-10 minutes whisk together eggs, milk, hot sauce, salt, and black pepper arrange tots in an even layer in a greased 3-quart baking dish top tots with half of the shredded cheese and the sausage mixture pour egg mixture evenly over tots and top with remaining cheese bake 40-60 minutes until set in the middle

item.title: Egg Muffins
item.description: Ingredients 7 eggs 2 cups cottage cheese 1 pound bacon 1 medium onion, diced 1 red bell pepper, diced 2 cups spinach, chopped 1/4 teaspoon black pepper 1 teaspoon garlic powder 1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper shredded cheese topper Directions preheat oven to 375 degrees cook bacon and cut into small pieces mix everything together in a large mixing bowl pour into muffin cups, top with cheese bake for 20-25 minutes until done (poke with a toothpick)

item.title: French Toast
item.description: Ingredients 1 cup oat milk 3 large eggs 2 tablespoons honey 1/4 teaspoon salt Directions preheat oven to 375 degrees whisk ingredients together dip bread 30 seconds each side, move to a cooling rack to sit for 1-2 minutes cook on griddle over medium-low heat, 2-3 minutes each side move to oven for storage

item.title: Granola
item.description: Ingredients 3 cups rolled oats 1 cup slivered almonds 1 cup cashews 3/4 cup shredded sweet coconut 1/4 cup plus 2 tablespoons dark brown sugar 1/4 cup plus 2 tablespoons maple syrup 1/4 cup vegetable oil 3/4 teaspoon salt 1 cup raisins Directions preheat oven to 250 degrees in a large bowl, combine the oats, nuts, coconut, and brown sugar in a separate bowl, combine maple syrup, oil, and salt combine both mixtures and pour onto 2 parchment paper lined sheet pans cook for 1 hour and 15 minutes, stirring every 15 minutes to achieve an even color remove from oven and transfer into a large bowl; add raisins and mix until evenly distributed

item.title: Mattie Granola
item.description: Ingredients 2 cups rolled oats 1/4 cup coconut oil 1/4 cup honey 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon 3/4 cup hemp hearts 1/4 cup chopped pecans 1/4 teaspoon salt Directions preheat oven to 350 mix all dry ingredients heat oil and honey in saucepan; mix into dry ingredients spread onto parchment paper lined baking sheet; sprinkle with salt check at 15 minutes; bake until perfect level of crispness achieved

item.title: Oat Bars
item.description: Ingredients 1 1/4 cups peanut butter 1/2 cup honey 3/4 cup shredded coconut 8 teaspoons sunflower seeds 8 teaspoons flax seeds 1/2 cup raisins 2 1/2 cups rolled oats Directions melt peanut butter and honey together mix in everything else except the oats mix in the oats flatten out in a square baking dish refrigerate for 1 hour slice into bars refrigerate for another hour store in an airtight container

item.title: Oatmeal
item.description: Ingredients 1/2 cup rolled old fashioned oats 1 teaspoon brown sugar 1/4 teaspoon salt other stuff: nuts, coconut, peanut butter powder, cinnamon, go wild Directions mix ingredients in a pint jar prepare by covering with boiling water or microwave

item.title: Waffles
item.description: Ingredients 2 eggs 2 cups all-purpose flour 1â€‰3/4 cups milk 1/2 cup vegetable oil 1 tablespoon white sugar 4 teaspoons baking powder 1/4 teaspoon salt 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract Directions mix all ingredients in a mixing bowl cook waffles on a waffle iron
